channel.title: Please Help!Need Fast Feedback!
channel.description: Ok, I have a problem with the expierience ganed with killing monsters!(Server Client:Ballzscape) How do i change xp rate of a skill??? And how to edit shop prices?

item.title: Please Help!Need Fast Feedback!
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

For The First Ques :

Open client.java & look for

TotalExp = (double)

It should look something like

TotalExp = (double)(1.33 * hitDiff);

if the “1.33” is different it’s ok thats just the XP your server gets.

Now that you have found the above code change the “1.33” to whatever you want it to be. This apears multiple times and you MUST change them all. There is in exception, if you see this piece of code just leave it alone.

TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);

Second Ques :
Search

Case *Object ID#*:

EX: Case 823:
That Is The Dummy…

Than Change The # After addSkillXP((

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help!Need Fast Feedback!
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

Its not edited in your client which I’m guessing is moparscape…
There will be a section in client.java find your current xp rate per damage, and find that number you should know what it looks like I can’t find it right now, but change it to what you want it to be. The prices is in item.cfg the first 3 are the prices, low alch, shop, high alch.

Read full topic
